org.apache.juneau.jena

Class RdfSerializerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerContext
        • org.apache.juneau.jena.RdfSerializerContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RdfCommonContext

    public final class RdfSerializerContext
extends SerializerContext
implements RdfCommonContext
    Configurable properties on the RdfSerializer class.

    Context properties are set by calling ContextFactory.setProperty(String, Object) on the context factory returned CoreApi.getContextFactory().

    The following convenience methods are also provided for setting context properties:

    • RdfSerializer.setProperty(String,Object)
    • RdfSerializer.setProperties(ObjectMap)
    • RdfSerializer.addNotBeanClasses(Class[])
    • RdfSerializer.addTransforms(Class[])
    • RdfSerializer.addImplClass(Class,Class)

    See ContextFactory for more information about context properties.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

    • Field Detail

      • RDF_addLiteralTypes

        public static final String RDF_addLiteralTypes
        Add XSI data types to non-String literals (Boolean, default=false).

        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_addRootProperty

        public static final String RDF_addRootProperty
        Add RDF root identifier property to root node (Boolean, default=false).

        When enabled an RDF property http://www.ibm.com/juneau/root is added with a value of "true" to identify the root node in the graph. This helps locate the root node during parsing.

        If disabled, the parser has to search through the model to find any resources without incoming predicates to identify root notes, which can introduce a considerable performance degradation.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_autoDetectNamespaces

        public static final String RDF_autoDetectNamespaces
        Auto-detect namespace usage (Boolean, default=true).

        Detect namespace usage before serialization.

        If enabled, then the data structure will first be crawled looking for namespaces that will be encountered before the root element is serialized.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RDF_namespaces

        public static final String RDF_namespaces
        Default namespaces (List<Namespace>, default=Namespace[0]).

        The default list of namespaces associated with this serializer.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
